thread.title: Charlotte Crosby goes public with new boyfriend Stephen Bear as they hit the town for a wild night out in London

author: lrandell
title: Charlotte Crosby goes public with new boyfriend Stephen Bear as they hit the town for a wild night out in London
text:
TV Magazine bear necessities Charlotte Crosby goes public with new boyfriend Stephen Bear as they hit the town for a wild night out in London 
Geordie Shore star is no longer hiding her feelings for her hunky new man BY Louise Randell, Senior Showbiz Reporter 4th February 2017, 11:01 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CHARLOTTE Crosby has gone public with her new boyfriend Stephen Bear as they hit the town together for a wild night out in London. 
The Geordie Shore star is no longer hiding her feelings for her hunky new man as they looked closer than ever during their outing. Fame Flynet 15 Charlotte Crosby and Stephen Bear have gone public with their romance 
Charlotte wore a tight little black dress and high heels, and accidentally flashed her nipples as she forgot to out a bra underneath. Fame Flynet Charlotte wore a see-through black dress and no bra Fame Flynet Bear opted for a jumper which has previously been seen on his new girlfriend Fame Flynet 15 They are now very much a couple 
Bear proved himself to be the perfect gentleman by carrying the bags and putting an arm around her as they waited for their ride home. 
They then climbed into the car together and headed off into the night. 
It comes after The Sun Online exclusively revealed the pair are more than just friends after growing close on the set of their MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us. Fame Flynet Charlotte looked incredible on her date night Fame Flynet Bear was the perfect gentleman and carried their bags Fame Flynet At the end of the night, Charlotte put on a coat to keep warm Fame Flynet 15 
Charlotte later seemingly confirmed they the hottest new celebrity couple by posing a picture online showing hear wearing a white jumper emblazoned with the word “his”. 
An insider told The Sun Online: “Bear and Charlotte have been snogging loads on set for Just Tattoo Of Us and have hardly kept it a secret to the crew. 
“It’s clear they are besotted with each other.” Fame Flynet Charlotte looked windswept as she came out of the venue Fame Flynet She showed off her amazing new figure in the tight little dress Fame Flynet The couple stood outside together at the end of the night SHORE AND MORE Everything you need to know about Geordie lass Charlotte Crosby LAYing IT BEAR Charlotte Crosby 'confirms romance' with Stephen Bear as they share cryptic snaps in 'his and hers' jumpers HUGGY BEAR Charlotte Crosby and Stephen Bear cuddle hours after showing off new romance with a naked pic in bed IT WASN'T LOVE Gaz Beadle's grandad claims he never loved Charlotte Crosby and it was just part of a Geordie Shore storyline THAT LOOKS COSY Shirtless Stephen Bear and Charlotte Crosby fuel romance rumours as 'they're caught in BED together' GEORDIE PHWOAR! Charlotte Crosby teases fans by wearing just an open white shirt in sizzling snapchat selfie Fame Flynet They were waiting for a car to take them home Fame Flynet They eventually climbed into the vehicle and headed home together Snapchat 15 Charlotte Crosby and Stephen Bear 
The former CBB winner had been filming the new MTV reality series alongside Bear – and insiders noticed they were ‘growing close’. 
They tried to pretend they weren’t a couple and were just work colleagues, but Bear was caught with his hands up her top. 
A show insider said at the time: “She also seems to have fallen for Bear’s charms and it looks like there’s something blossoming.” 
But their new romance has caused beef for Bear’s new gig on Celebs Go Dating . Charlotte Crosby and Stephen Bear snuggle with takeaway hours after confirming romance 
He's one of this year's batch of stars looking for love with 'ordinary folk' . 
A source from the show said: "Bear is doing Celebs Go Dating which puts him in an awkward position to be in a relationship. 
"This is why they’ve been keeping things under wraps as much as possible in public, even though it’s clear they are together and have strong feelings for each other."
